name: Astrohazard Defense
description:
Astrohazard Defense is an arcade 2D game where player pushes away incoming space hazards with the AstroBeam™, protecting the Client's spaceship from collisions. The longer the player survives, the more assets the Client can retrieve and more Space Credits are earned.

How much can you earn?

This game is also an arcade preview of Astrohazard Solutions Ltd., a PC game created by Bob Games, released in December 2017.
